metadata.title: CVE-2023-22294 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Privilege escalation in Tribe29 Checkmk Appliance before 1.6.4 allowsauthenticated site users to escalate privileges via incorrectly setpermissions.

criterions.comment: check-mk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
